text: tatha (yaad karo) jab moosa ne apanee jaati ke lie jal kee praarthana kee, to hamane kahaah apanee laathee patthar par maaro. to usase baarah[1] sote phoot pade aur pratyek parivaar ne apane peene ke sthaan ko pahachaan liya. allaah ka diya khao aur pio aur dharatee mein upadrav karate na phiro
